TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlTableRowCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlTableRowCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class HtmlTableRowCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type HtmlTableRowCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 物件的集合，這些物件表示 控制項的列。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent the rows of an control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別以程式設計方式管理的集合表示中的資料列物件控制項。Use the class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the rows in an control. 這個類別常用於加入、 移除或修改的內容中的資料列控制項。This class is commonly used to add, remove, or modify the contents of a row in an control. > [!NOTE] > 控制項包含屬性，表示集合的物件。An control contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 每個代表個別資料表中的資料列。Each represents an individual row in the table. 包含屬性，表示集合的物件。An contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 這些物件，代表個別資料表的儲存格。These objects, in turn, represent the individual cells of the table. 若要擷取個別的資料格，請先取得物件，表示資料列包含資料格，從集合控制項。To retrieve an individual cell, first get the object, representing the row containing the cell, from the collection of the control. 您可以取得物件，表示從資料列中的資料格集合。You can then get the object, representing the cell in the row, from the collection of the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以動態方式產生的內容控制項加入至資料列來集合。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically generate the contents of an control by adding rows to an collection. 請注意，屬性表格是物件。Notice that the property of a table is the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollection/CS/htmltablerowcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollection/VB/htmltablerowcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加入指定物件的結尾集合。Use this method to add the specified object to the end of an collection. 若要插入中間集合中，使用方法。To insert an in the middle of the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將附加的資料列的資料表，由物件，結尾集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a row of a table, represented by an object, to the end of an collection. 請注意，屬性表格是物件。Notice that the property of a table is the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來移除所有物件從集合和重設屬性`0`。Use this method to remove all objects from the collection and reset the property to `0`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法移除所有項目從集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all items from the collection. 然後加入至集合並顯示在新的項目控制項。New entries are then added to the collection and displayed in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法的內容複製集合配置到指定物件，在陣列中指定索引處開始。Use this method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified object, starting at the specified index in the array. > [!NOTE] > `array`參數必須是以零為起始。The `array` parameter must be a zero-based . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來建立陣列，其中包含與相同的內容集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an array that contains the same contents as the collection. 陣列會逐一顯示集合的內容。The array is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.
The number of objects in the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷中所包含的資料列數目集合。Use the property to determine the number of rows contained in the collection. 屬性通常用於逐一查看集合以判斷右上繫結時。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷資料列數目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of rows in the control. 此值將做迴圈的上限來逐一查看資料表的資料列。This value is then used as the upper bound of a loop to iterate through the rows of a table. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionCount/CS/htmltablerowcollectioncountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionCount/VB/htmltablerowcollectioncountvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An -implemented object that contains all objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立-實作可以透過取得每個項目中反覆查看物件集合。Use this method to create an -implemented object that can be iterated through to get each item in the collection. 使用屬性來取得集合中目前的項目。Use the property to get the current element in the collection. 使用移至下一個項目，集合中的方法。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法，以將列舉值移至的初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫方法之後建立-實作物件，或之後使用方法，以將列舉值移至集合中的第一個項目。You must call the method after creating an -implemented object, or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否則，項目會由未定義屬性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來建立物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an object. 物件會逐一顯示的內容集合。The object is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowCollectionGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionGetEnumerator/CS/htmltablerowcollectionienumeratorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowCollectionGetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionGetEnumerator/VB/htmltablerowcollectionienumeratorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性衍生自就會覆寫永遠傳回`false`表示存取集合經過同步化 （不安全執行緒）。This property is derived from and is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that access to the collection is not synchronized (not thread safe). 如需有關屬性，請參閱屬性介面。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個索引子以取得個別物件從位於指定的索引，使用簡單陣列標記法的集合。Use this indexer to get an individual object from the collection at a specified index, using simple array notation. > [!NOTE] > 集合是以零為起始。因此，集合中的第一個項目包含索引值`0`。The collection is zero-based; therefore, the first element in the collection contains an index value of `0`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用索引子來擷取資料表資料列，由物件，從集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a table row, represented by an object, from the collection. 資料列中的資料格則會更新以新的內容。The cells in the row are then updated with new content. 請注意，資料表的屬性是物件。Notice that the property of the table is the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來移除從指定索引處的物件集合。Use this method to remove the object at the specified index from the collection. 以零為起始的索引編號。The index number is zero-based. 因此，集合中的第一個項目具有索引值`0`。Therefore, the first item in the collection has an index value of `0`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定的索引值範圍以外的索引時，會引發例外狀況。If you specify an index that is outside the range of index values, an exception is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法移除從指定索引處的項目集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove the item at the specified index from the collection. 這個範例會移除第一個資料列控制項。This example removes the first row of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableRowCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionRemoveAt/CS/htmltablerowcollectionremoveatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableRowCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableRowCollectionRemoveAt/VB/htmltablerowcollectionremoveatvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的索引是位於集合的索引值範圍之外。

span.span: The specified index is outside the range of index values in the collection.
